en-US.summary: A tea timer application with visual display for Echo Show devices
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask tea timer to start a timer for 5 minutes
Alexa, ask tea timer to change display to hourglass
Alexa, ask tea timer how much time is left
en-US.name: Tea Timer
en-US.description: Tea Timer helps you brew the perfect cup of tea by providing a customizable timer specifically designed for Echo Show devices. Set a timer between 1 and 60 minutes, choose from different visual displays (teacup, hourglass, or progress bar), and get notified when your tea is ready. You can pause, resume, or cancel the timer at any time, and customize the alarm mode. The visual display updates in real-time, showing you the remaining time and a pixel art visualization of your timer's progress.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Sample testing instructions - use the invocation name 'tea timer' to launch the skill. You can then set timers, pause them, and switch display types.
